content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a turnstile. Moving in a clockwise direction from the turnstile, the elements on the path are a wardrobe, a dome, a flamingo, an Angora rabbit, a duck, a badger, a sundial, a space bar, a confectionery store, a washing machine, a pirate ship, a carton, a Band-Aid, a Cocker Spaniels, a King Charles Spaniel, a lionfish, a golf ball, a Cardigan Welsh Corgi, and a Soft-coated Wheaten Terrier. Starting from the flamingo, you move around the ring by 8 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 12 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

I have been given the following information:

* Starting position: Top dot, turnstile
* Movements: Clockwise
* Step length: 8 steps (flamingo), 12 steps (from flamingo to next item)
* Items on the path: wardrobe, dome, flamingo, Angora rabbit, duck, badger, sundial, space bar, confectionery store, washing machine, pirate ship, carton, Band-Aid, Cocker Spaniels, King Charles Spaniel, lionfish, golf ball, Cardigan Welsh Corgi, Soft-coated Wheaten Terrier

Based on the above information, I will find the confectionery store after my movements.

What will you find?

Based on the above information, I will find the confectionery store after my movements.
